bnl.gov.shift

Class XMLShifts

  • java.lang.Object
    • bnl.gov.shift.XMLShifts

  • public class XMLShifts
extends Object
    shifts (collection) object that can be represented as XML/JSON in payload data.
    Author:
    eschuhmacher
